mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market (market_id, name, longitude, latitude, phone_num,category_cd, url, address_name, road_address_name, sigungu_cd) VALUES (#{market_id},#{name},#{longitude},#{latitude},#{phone_num},#{category_cd},#{url},#{address_name},#{road_address_name},#{sigungu_cd})
mapper.select:
select u.name, u.img_url, r.review_seq, r.title, r.star, r.created_at
from user u join review r on u.user_seq = r.user_seq where market_seq = #{market_seq}
select round(AVG(star),1) from review where market_seq = #{market_seq}
select * from Review where market_seq=#{market_seq} and img_1=#{img_1},img_2=#{img_2},img_3=#{img_3},img_4=#{img_4},img_5=#{img_5}
mapper.update: update market set market_id=#{market_id},name=#{name},longitude=#{longitude},latitude=#{latitude},category_cd=#{category_cd}, phone_num=#{phone_num},url=#{url},address_name=#{address_name},road_address_name=#{road_address_name}, sigungu_cd=#{sigungu_cd}) where market_seq = #{market_seq}
